inclusion.criterion: history of neurologic illness or injury
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: pregnancy or planning to become pregnant
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has neurogenic bladder, history of neurologic illness/injury, and is over 18. Exclusions include anatomical bladder outlet obstruction (unknown), severe debilitating MS (unknown), history of seizures (not met), and pregnancy or planning to become pregnant (unknown).
